name: graphqlfederationdemo
description: A monorepo which demonstrates a federated GraphQL architecture for use with various backend sources. Designed to be scalable.

scripts.start: concurrently -n api-user,api-product,service-user,service-product,gateway -c yellow,green,cyan,magenta,blue "npm:start -w api-user" "npm:start -w api-product" "npm:start -w service-user" "npm:start -w service-product" "npm:start -w gateway"

author: Geoff Godwin
